page.title: 18ANGMERING CARNIVAL
page.content:
Every year in Angmering, a carnival is held with about 6 floats which they hope will be boosted to 10 in 1986.
Some of the floats are entered by children which is very good as most children don't like that sort of thing. The procession raised Â£40 and towards the end of the procession another Â£100 was raised. The best float was won by the Lamb Inn with 'LITTLE BO PEEP' and St Wilfred's with 'YOU'LL NEVER WALK ALONE'. Every year at the carnival, the carnival itself gets better with more people volunteering to help. Each year the procession gets bigger and better.
